data.title: The Rhined
data.meta_description: We are a specialty cut-to-order cheese and wine shop located in the Over-the-Rhine neighborhood of Cincinnati. We focus on domestic, small batch cheese and also offer many regional selections.
data.text:
We are a specialty cut-to-order cheese and wine shop located in the Over-the-Rhine neighborhood of Cincinnati. At the Rhined you can…

Sit at the counter of our intimate, tiny shop and sample a cheese flight

Enjoy a glass of wine in our sun-filled courtyard or streetery

Take home a cheese board filled with our offerings for your next gathering or let us do the work and order a cheese board

Attend a lively Get Cultured class like cheese board building or Bubbles & Cheese

Book a private event at Bloom Room, our private event space located right next to The Rhined

We focus on domestic, small batch cheese and also offer many regional selections. We only put cheeses that we absolutely love in the case, cheeses made by hand from producers with integrity. We want to make these producers proud and celebrate their commitment to crafting exceptional fromage. We use the same philosophy with our wine offerings. Small producers, handmade, and wines that taste of place.

Our educated cheesemongers are here for all of your questions and, sometimes, we have a good cheesy joke.

For corporate gifting, custom catering requests, cheese “cake” quotes and all other inquiries: hello@therhined.com
